name: Localization_Readme
observations: Project overview for ICTServe localization: scanning + extraction tools; translation conventions; email localization; tools/scripts in scripts/ (scanner + extractor) and sample usage; translation key naming pattern {filename}.{section}.{key}; recommends `php scripts/scan-hardcoded-strings.php` for scanning.

name: Localization_Implementation_Summary
observations: Implementation details: scanning produced 4,139 hardcoded strings; created `lang/en` and `lang/ms` translation files; created `emails.php` (370+ keys) and updated other language files; scanning & extraction tools support bilingual format detection; results show top files needing localization and key naming conventions for email and admin keys.

name: Localization_Final_Report
observations: Final report: Automated scanning + extraction completed; 1,572+ translation keys generated; email templates fully localized; output includes `localization-scan-results.json`; project branch and dates listed; statistics showing improved localization rates and progress metrics.

name: Localization_Scan_Report
observations: Detailed scan results from the hardcoded string scanner: files scanned, stats (hardcoded strings, already localized strings), and a per-file breakdown. Output JSON file `localization-scan-results.json`.

name: Before_And_After_Localization
observations: Before: bilingual inline strings (English / Malay) mixed in templates; After: replaced with translation keys using __(), with clear examples; benefits: dynamic switching, maintainability, scalability.

name: Localization_Validation_Summary
observations: Validation details: PHP linter check for translation files; translation parity and structure verified; email template variable interpolation validated; no breaking changes; translation key naming conventions validated.
